screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
textsize = (textsize[0] + 60,textsize[1] + 60) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 107 wsizex = textsize[0] + 107 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20,64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1] + 27)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxGenuine
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 87 wsizex = textsize[0] + 87 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1] + 27)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
textsize = (textsize[0] + 60,textsize[1] + 60) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 107 wsizex = textsize[0] + 107 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20,64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1] + 27)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

eLabel.text: Die roten Quadrate genau in den Ecken positionieren

Empfohlen wird ein Fullbackup vor dem Update!
